name: Apsley Falls
description:
Introduction

Due to the length of the gorge and no need for long ropes, the falls trend to be abseiled seperately. This page looks at abseiling the falls.

You can check the water level at the falls here: http://www.walk-new-england.org/riverheights/IDN60232.557012.plt.shtml-apsley.htm
